prompt: in fortnite what is the different between blue health and white health
orig_response: In Fortnite, health is represented in two distinct types: white health and blue health. White health refers to the standard health points that players have, which can be restored by consuming healing items like bandages, medkits, or slurp juice. This health can be reduced to zero, resulting in elimination. On the other hand, blue health, also known as shield health, provides an additional layer of protection beyond the standard health. It can be gained through items like shield potions or mini shields and can absorb damage before the player's white health is affected. Importantly, blue health can be replenished only up to a maximum of 100 points, while white health can go up to 100 points as well, but can be increased further with certain items or effects.
